title: YMDUCH Women's Sexy Elegant Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Bodycon Long Evening Formal Dress
description: Fabric: Polyester and spandex fabric, the fabric is soft, stretchy and comfortable to wear.

Unique design: long sleeves, off shoulder design, you can also choose not strapless according to your needs, the back V-shaped open back design, the back also has the invisible zipper design, which is convenient for you to put on and take off, the skirt of the long evening dress It is a mermaid design, and the length of the dress is so that you can still mop the floor when wearing high heels. Can make you more elegant and dignified.
There are five different sizes to choose for you: S(US 4-6), M(US 8-10), L(US 12-14), XL(US 14-16),XXL(US 18).

Suitable occasions: Evening dresses, cocktail parties, parties, clubs, graduation ceremonies, important business meetings, weddings, bridesmaid dresses, birthday parties, portraits and other important and formal occasions can be worn.
Matching: A dignified and elegant long formal dress. When wearing it, it is recommended that you wear it with clutches, high heels, necklaces and other accessories.
